div.style: float: right; padding: 10px 15px 15px 10px; font: 10px Arial; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-transform: none;

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "px;" + "_height: " + data:height + "px;" + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

div.style: float: left; padding: 5px 60px 5px 0pt; font: bold 14px Arial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-transform: none;
float: left; width: 800px; padding: 4px 0pt; position: relative; overflow: hidden;
div.script: var cssfeed=new gfeedrssticker("example1", "example1class", 4000, "_new") cssfeed.addFeed("Fery Eka Indriawan", "http://zonamagazine2.blogspot.com/feeds/posts/default") //Specify "label" plus URL to RSS feed cssfeed.displayoptions("date") //show the specified additional fields cssfeed.setentrycontainer("div") //Wrap each entry with a DIV tag cssfeed.filterfeed(10, "date") //Show 10 entries, sort by date cssfeed.entries_per_page(1) cssfeed.init()

div.a: Serbuan Hacker Selebritas: Siapa Target Selanjutnya?
